item.description:
Chandra has offered to lead lead a walk at 10 am on Saturday, November 13th at Norris Reservation in Norwell, which allows dogs and belongs to the Trustees of Reservations. It has 2 miles of walking trails and a boathouse on the North River. The entrance is off Dover St, which is off Rte 123. It is right near the center of Norwell. More info here:
http://www.thetrustee...

The parking lot is off of Dover St. at the intersection of West Street

Please remember to cancel if you are not going to attend.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the parking lot off of Dover St.

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: Norris Reservation
